Pattern Library

event cards

< back to style guide

PROPS:

  • image: the image displayed at the top of the card (optional, but required if you want upcoming dates to display)
  • upcomingDates: array of objects containing the month and the day (optional)
  • altText: alt text for the image (optional but highly recommended for SEO and accessibility)
  • category (optional)
  • title
  • description (optional)
  • conductor (optional)
  • instrument (optional)
  • dateRange: the dates for the event, displayed at the bottom of the card above the CTA (optional)
  • link: the entire card will be clickable and point to this URL (optional)
  • cta: the text displayed in the button (optional)
  • ctaLink: only the cta button is clickable to this link (optional)
